position: Software Engineer | Software and AI | IIT Kharagpur '22

experience.title: SDE Intern
experience.description: • Developed the cross-platform childcare application using React Native• Built the backend using GraphQL and AWS services like SES, S3, etc., imple-mented ElastiCache, reducing fetching time by upto 60% for various APIs• Integrated Twilio WebRTC for video calling feature and Firebase for chat• Revamped and built a horizontally scalable server architecture using ElasticBeanstalk and a CI/CD pipeline using CircleCI and CodeDeploy decreasingdeploy time by 80% and server down time by 90%
experience.description_html: • Developed the cross-platform childcare application using React Native• Built the backend using GraphQL and AWS services like SES, S3, etc., imple-mented ElastiCache, reducing fetching time by upto 60% for various APIs• Integrated Twilio WebRTC for video calling feature and Firebase for chat• Revamped and built a horizontally scalable server architecture using ElasticBeanstalk and a CI/CD pipeline using CircleCI and CodeDeploy decreasingdeploy time by 80% and server down time by 90%

experience.title: SDE Intern
experience.description: • Built a Slack Bot and slack notification service using Spring Boot, Kafka andMongoDB with automated messaging system decreasing response time ofsupport team by 40% and engagement by around 20%• Built an listener-processor architecture to process heavy API calls asyn-chronously using Spring Boot and Kafka

experience.title: Engineering Intern
experience.description: • Developed an npm package for Reactjs and a Gatsby Plugin for Gatsby web apps respectively, to integrate VWO(vwo.com) smartcode directly into the application.• Handled the backend for Event Architecture deployment from VWO editor.• Created a cron job to constantly optimize production MySQL table, keeping data size in check.• Changed the system to save heavy data in compressed format (GZIP encoding) and decoding data when needed.• Wrote backend APIs for a search engine called Kroomsa.
experience.description_html: • Developed an npm package for Reactjs and a Gatsby Plugin for Gatsby web apps respectively, to integrate VWO(vwo.com) smartcode directly into the application.• Handled the backend for Event Architecture deployment from VWO editor.• Created a cron job to constantly optimize production MySQL table, keeping data size in check.• Changed the system to save heavy data in compressed format (GZIP encoding) and decoding data when needed.• Wrote backend APIs for a search engine called Kroomsa.

experience.title: Software Development Intern
experience.description: •Developed a cross-platform mobile application, for customer use integrating services like package tracking, philately, etc. using React Native .•Developed another cross-platform mobile application for delivery of packages and bags from one location to another. Developed functionalities for keeping track of packages at various stages, scanning barcodes using phone camera or bluetooth scanner,  etc.
